captions.text:
It's going to be difficult tactics wise.
More sections this year, like wooden bank and table top, 
those are the crucial passing points.

I'm sure it will be fun to watch, 
so hope everyone checks out my riding.

The fun and the difficulty is so much different 
from going down the mountains.

Surface feeling is something totally new.
Places that I thought for sure won't slip was actually slippery and stuff. So much fun.

Something is going to happen!
Both for the riders and the spectators. I can't wait!

title: Racing through the Holy Temple in Japan
